app.title: Pension Fund Comparison Tool
section.growth.title: Cumulative Growth
section.growth.help: Total compounded growth over the selected period, assuming you stayed invested the whole time.
section.avg_return.title: Average Yearly Return
section.avg_return.help: Annualised average return per year over the selected period.
section.extremes.title: Worst vs Best Quarter
section.extremes.help: Worst and best single quarter returns for each fund within the selected period.
section.participants.title: Number of Participants
section.participants.help: Shows the latest number of participants in the fund and how that number has changed over the selected period.
section.expenses.title: Expenses
section.expenses.help: Shows the fund's factual expenses for last year. Higher values mean higher fees.
